item.description:
This was posted on the message board by Sarah, transformed into a note and now finally an event! Thank you Sarah for this great idea and leading this event!!! Gotta love the evolution of a simple post on the message board

CONTACT SARAH FOR DETAILS PLEASE

Ma Soba Boston

Ticket price * : Resevation - $28 / person, Walk-in - $35 / person

Menu for Sushi-

Appetizers Sake or Wine
-Edamame
-Shumai
-Pot Sticker Dumpling
Soup or Salad
-Miso Soup
-House Salad
Sake Night
-Sake
-Wine
Popular Maki Rolls
-California Roll
-Asparagus Roll
-Vegetable Roll
-Spicy Tuna Roll
-Spicy Salmon Roll
Special Giant Maki Rolls
-Super Crunch Roll
-Sundrop Roll
-Snow Cone Roll
-Caterpillar Roll
-Crunch Dragon Roll
Desserts
-Mochi Icecream
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah has stepped up to the plate to organize a new event - email her please - her contact info is the all caps link in the details
item.why: Because it's Sushi and Sake being headed up by a new organizer! :)
item.name: Ma Soba - Contact Sarah For Details Please
